languages.text: "Я приш{mf|ел|ла}, чтобы рассказать, как вы теперь будете вести дела. Советую слушать внимательно".
"I have come to inform you all of how you will be doing business henceforth. I advise you to listen well."
languages.original_text: "Я приш{mf|ел|ла}, чтобы рассказать, как вы теперь будете вести дела. Советую слушать внимательно".

traits.locale_text: "I have come to inform you all of how you will be doing business henceforth. I advise you to listen well."
"I have come to inform you all of how you will be doing business henceforth. I advise you to listen well."
"I have come to inform you all of how you will be doing business henceforth. I advise you to listen well."
"I have come to inform you all of how you will be doing business henceforth. I advise you to listen well."

languages.text: “我来这里，是为了通知你们今后该怎么做生意。我建议你们都好好听着。”
languages.original_text: "I have come to inform you all of how you will be doing business henceforth. I advise you to listen well."

traits.locale_text: “我来这里，是为了通知你们今后该怎么做生意。我建议你们都好好听着。”

languages.text: 「私は今後のお前たちのビジネスのやり方を知らせるためにやってきたのだ。よく聞いておくように」
languages.original_text: "I have come to inform you all of how you will be doing business henceforth. I advise you to listen well."

traits.locale_text: 「私は今後のお前たちのビジネスのやり方を知らせるためにやってきたのだ。よく聞いておくように」

languages.text: «Vengo para informarles de cómo van a proceder con sus negocios a partir de ahora. Les aconsejo que presten atención».
languages.original_text: "I have come to inform you all of how you will be doing business henceforth. I advise you to listen well."

traits.locale_text: «Vengo para informarles de cómo van a proceder con sus negocios a partir de ahora. Les aconsejo que presten atención».

languages.text: « Je suis {mf|venu|venue} vous expliquer comment vos affaires vont fonctionner à l'avenir. Je vous suggère d'écouter attentivement. »
languages.original_text: "I have come to inform you all of how you will be doing business henceforth. I advise you to listen well."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis {mf|venu|venue} vous expliquer comment vos affaires vont fonctionner à l'avenir. Je vous suggère d'écouter attentivement. »

languages.text: "Ich bin hier, um klarzustellen, wie Ihr von nun an Eure Geschäfte tätigen werdet. Ich rate Euch, genau zuzuhören."
languages.original_text: "I have come to inform you all of how you will be doing business henceforth. I advise you to listen well."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin hier, um klarzustellen, wie Ihr von nun an Eure Geschäfte tätigen werdet. Ich rate Euch, genau zuzuhören."

languages.text: "Bundan böyle nasıl iş yapacağınız konusunda sizi bilgilendirmek üzere buradayım. Kulak kabartmanızı tavsiye ederim."
languages.original_text: "I have come to inform you all of how you will be doing business henceforth. I advise you to listen well."

traits.locale_text: "Bundan böyle nasıl iş yapacağınız konusunda sizi bilgilendirmek üzere buradayım. Kulak kabartmanızı tavsiye ederim."
